hypothesis_content.title: Volume Confirmation Failure at Regime Resistance
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC attempts NEUTRAL-to-BULL transition but fails to achieve >1.5x average daily volume on breakout above key resistance (previous 90-day high), the probability of rejection back to NEUTRAL within 10 days exceeds 75%.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low-volume breakouts lack institutional conviction and often represent false breakouts. This is particularly relevant during uncertain regime transitions where market participants await confirmation before committing capital.
entry_conditions: Daily volume on breakout day < 1.5x 30-day average volume
Regime transition signal: NEUTRAL → BULL (but confidence < 70%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price drops 8% from breakout level OR returns below 90-day high
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price sustains above breakout level for 10 days with regime confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Rejection probability < 75% across 25+ historical instances, or low-volume breakouts sustain > 50% of the time.
